description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Saudi Arabia Sophisticated City Break with Rooftop Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Discover for yourself true Arabic hospitality at the InterContinental Al Khobar, an IHG Hotel, where modern conveniences meet traditional design and customs. Escape the heat of Saudi Arabia with a dip in the rooftop swimming pool, book yourself in for a pampering treatment at the day spa, and sample the hotel's famous date pudding at T. Square. For a global gourmet expedition, dine at Twist restaurant, an international buffet and show kitchen featuring themed nights and a decadent dessert station.

hotels.title: Saudi Arabia Sophisticated Urban Retreat Minutes from Al Khobar
hotels.description: Minutes from the Khobar Corniche and Mall of Dhahran, the voco Al Khobar, an IHG Hotel is an oasis of rest and relaxation in the midst of a bustling cosmopolitan city. Savour satisfying global cuisines at the multiple onsite restaurants, indulge in a soothing treatment at the Soul Wellness and Spa or relish a refreshing swim in the pool. After experiencing the best this Saudi Arabian city has to offer, retire to a sophisticated room for a well-deserved slumber.

hotels.vendor_name: Kempinski Al Othman Hotel Al Khobar
hotels.title: Five-Star Saudi Arabia Kempinski Stay in the Centre of Al Khobar
hotels.description: Between resplendent red sands and the shimmering bright blue of the Arabian Gulf stands the iconic twin towers of Kempinski Al Othman Hotel Al Khobar, a five-star oasis of opulence. Perfectly located at the junction between Khobar, Dharan and Dammam, the hotel is only a short drive from some of Saudi Arabia's best attractions. With five dining venues, a cigar lounge and a world-class spa equipped with Moroccan bath chambers, Kempinski Al Othman Hotel Al Khobar is the perfect starting point to explore the region's wealth of historical, cultural and architectural treasures.

hotels.title: Al Khobar Corniche Escape with Indoor Pool, Spa & Gourmet Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience refined Arabian coastal living at this Mövenpick retreat nestled along Al Khobar’s scenic Corniche, overlooking the shimmering waters of the Gulf. Relax in style in the hotel's spacious rooms and suites, featuring chic interiors, marble bathrooms and world-class amenities. Take a leisurely dip in the naturally lit indoor pool and pamper with soothing treatments and massages at the spa. Dining is a delight with plenty of options: savour innovative Indian delicacies at Maharaja by Vineet, helmed by a Michelin-starred chef, relish international buffets at The Blue Restaurant and sip on refreshing mocktails from The View Lounge, paired with sea views. Just a short stroll from the Al Khobar Corniche and lively malls, this hotel is an ideal base for blending culture and coastal exploration.
